text:
Let's celebrate Christmas and learn English 
with Friends! So it is super hot in Monica and

Rachel's apartment because their radiator broke. 
This is a radiator. So let's watch what happens!

Alright now! Let's learn all the most difficult 
vocabulary and pronunciation from that scene,

but quickly before we do I want to let you know 
that, if you are new here, every single week we

make fun lessons just like this one to help you 
understand fast speaking natives: without getting

lost, without missing the jokes and without 
subtitles! Just like our friend Rainvee who

says that their pronunciation is getting better 
each day with our lessons! And yours will too,

it's really simple: hit that subscribe button and 
the bell below so you don't miss any of our new

lessons. Also it's christmas time and I have 
a little present for you! It's this pdf Power

Lesson and it's going to help you to master all 
the vocabulary and pronunciation from this scene

and take your fluency to the next level! So to get 
that just look up here or down description below!

Would you like to be able to understand natives 
even when we speak really fast and connect our

speech like this? Then you'd be able to understand 
your favorite series and movies even without the

subtitles. Well, we'll show you how! The best 
place to start is with our three-part Master Class

and the best part is it's absolutely free! You can 
sign up by going up here or down the description

below and when you sign up for that you'll 
also get the pdf Power Lesson for this video!

Hey! If you're enjoying this lesson then 
next I highly recommend you check out this

other Friends lesson that features 
the Holiday Armadillo and Santa.

You'll find that by clicking up 
here or down description below.
